    • Method Detail

      • getPattern

        @Nonnull
public String getPattern()

      • format

        @Nullable
public String format(@Nullable
                               Calendar date)
        Description copied from interface: Formatter

        Formats an instance into its literal representation.

        The resulting String may be set as an argument to Formatter.parse(java.lang.String) resulting in a similar instance as the input.

        Parameters:
        date - the instance to be formatted
        Returns:
        A String representing the instance's state.

      • parse

        @Nullable
public Calendar parse(@Nullable
                                String str)
                         throws ParseException
        Description copied from interface: Formatter

        Parses a literal representation into an instance of type T.

        The resulting instance T may be set as an argument to Formatter.format(T) resulting in an equal String as the input.

        Parameters:
        str - the String to be parsed
        Returns:
        an instance of type T whose state is initialized given the parameters of the input String.
        Throws:
        ParseException - if the String cannot be parsed.
